QuestData.Title: A Harsh Reminder
QuestData.Description: Welcome to the front lines, commander, where the wastelands and the jungle collide.$b$bThe battle below rages on, but I believe one side is beginning to overwhelm the other. This cannot be allowed to happen.$b$bThe gronnlings are gaining an upper hand and must be stopped before they pose a threat to Highpass.$b$bI will get closer to the battle while you thin their ranks. Meet me within Affliction Ridge when you are done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa denizens of the wasteland in Affliction Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: You have a true talent for combat.
